main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Elmer, New Jersey on December 15, 1966, where the observer witnessed a triangular object with three lights.
interesting points: The object appeared gold in color and was moving at the speed of a blimp., The sighting was observed by the witness and his sister., Four people were in the car which was traveling in a southeasterly direction at about 50 miles per hour., The distance to the object was estimated to be between 3 to 10 miles., The sighting lasted from approximately 6:15 to 6:45 P.M., but there were insufficient details for a conclusive evaluation.
witness description: The observer was a school student with above-average intelligence who shared the sighting with his sister.
